title: Phone will not charge unless turned off, but wait there's more...
content:
My pixel 3a will not charge when it is powered on, also after plugging phone it it decides to power its self back up stopping the ability to get charged up any further... I have rebooted, safe mode, factory defaulted etc. 

Tried multiple different chargers I know work with other devices, tried plugging into USB port on computer etc.

This phone is just a year old and I still owe money on it, what gives?
